document_data.name: ''Shining Light of Lathander''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shining Light of Lathander''''' were enchanted [[greatsword]]s used by and gifted by the members of particularly rich temples of [[Lathander]], Bringer of the Dawn, in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Shining Light of Lathander'' swords were given a ''+2'' enchantment as well as the ability to blast the enemies of the [[Church of Lathander]] with ''[[searing light]]'' once a day. These swords also glowed with soft orange-tinted light in the {{SI|15|'"|long=yes}} radius.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century DR, the Church of Lathander was favorably viewing adventuring and considered them to be the bringers of Lathander light into the long lost and forgotten places. As such, the temples were known to grant ''Shining Light of Lathander'' as a boon to especially favored adventurers.
